name: Arash
backgroundInfo: I believe that more than two decades of experience in education and coaching, as well as strong management skills, have signicantly contributed to the academic and practical advancement of my field of work. Efficiency, commitment, enthusiasm, and high motivation are my main characteristics. My ability to establish effective communication with colleagues and learners, problem-solving skills, exceptional management techniques, and performance evaluation capabilities have paved the way for success in the fields of education, coaching, and management. With over 20 years of mentoring and teaching experience, I am currently working as a freelancer in business administration, and also as an English instructor and university lecturer. After two years of work and study in Germany and receiving the CELTA certicate from Cambridge University in Frankfurt, I am now pursuing a PhD in English teaching in Tehran.
title: PhD in English Language Teaching

box4_list1: Providing multilingual content and editing international contracts
box5_list1: Managing relations with business partners and domestic organizations
box6_list1: Designing and planning curricula and syllabi, training and interviewing teachers
box7_list1: Teaching general and academic languages, IELTS, TOEFL, GRE, PTE, CELTA
box8_list1: Sourcing APIs and international providers and establishing affiliate links

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi there! I'm Soheil Mansouri, a passionate Full Stack Developer specializing in JavaScript technologies. I have a strong command of JavaScript and am well-versed in frameworks such as React.js, Next.js, and Node.js. My experience includes working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, Git ,Github, TypeScript, Node, React, Next, Vue, Express, Fastify, Mongodb, Mysql, Alpine, Sass, Bootstrap5 and Tailwind CSS, making me proficient in most JavaScript frameworks. From a young age, I developed a deep love for computers, programming, and coffee. JavaScript has captured my heart, with Go language being my second love. I thrive on tackling bugs and solving complex problems, which is what drives my passion for coding. With three years of experience in the industry, I am continually striving to enhance my skills and knowledge. My ultimate goal is to become a full-stack expert utilizing PostgreSQL, Next.js, Nest.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
